author: andreas
content:
No no, it looks like the S100, but it is much, much better, at least what regards image quality. Basically I'd use any of the photos that I've linked to on my blog. Even the ISO 6400 kitchen wall. I see only three things that I don't like:
  1. It seems to be sluggish in some respects
  2. It has no EVF
  3. It does not go as wide as 24 mm


I don't buy it because the OM-D is portable enough for me. I don't need anything smaller or lighter.
